def testBestQuiz():
    print('Testing bestQuiz()...', end='')
    a = [ [ 88,  80, 91 ],
          [ 68, 100, -1 ]]
    print(bestQuiz(a))

          [ 68, 100, 100 ]]
    assert(bestQuiz(a) == 1)
